comments:
description:
NPE thrown out when double click data set after add a filter to a chart 

steps to reproduce:
1. create a chart
2. add a filter in chart dialog and close
3. double click to edit data set
4. go to computed column page

actual result:
NPE thrown out

expected result:
No exception thrown out

exception stack trace:
